textContent:
Solution
The problem of curiosity about illegal drugs
Teachers should emphasize the dangers of drug abuse (for example, they should use content that may be considered somewhat extreme, such as videos of actual abusers).
The availability of illegal drugs
Tougher crackdown on smugglers (governments should enact laws that impose harsher penalties on smugglers)
Escape from reality
Introduction of psychological counselors and reduction of hesitation to using them (spreading positive images of psychological counseling among members of the educational institution)
